title: Throwing the Hammer Down Two Times with Hammer & Sickle!
itunes:title: Throwing the Hammer Down Two Times with Hammer & Sickle!
description: This week on The Cigar Authority we're taking a look at stocking stuffers for men - real men! Our favorite cologne of all time! And we have a special guest from Hammer & Sickle... Eric Hanson himself and we're lighting up two of his best cigars yet: the Hermitage and Second Growth. PLUS... We present a new segment, 'The Gentleman's Way" by Debonaire Cigars and Rum.
